alert.note: Alert for Greene; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 6:52PM CDT until June 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Greene County in east Tennessee... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 751 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jonesborough, or 7 miles west of Johnson City, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Jonesborough, Midway, Gray, Oak Grove, Telford, Leesburg, Chucky, Avondale and Limestone. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 14 and 21. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 39 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
